hints.content: On the number line, we start at $259$ and move **right** $\redE{1}$, then $\purpleD{40}$, and finally $\blueE{626}$ more.

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, tick marks labeled 259, 260, 300, and 926. An arrow labeled plus 1 is above the number line beginning at 259 and ending at 260. An arrow labeled plus 40 is above the number line beginning at 260 and ending at 300. An arrow labeled plus 626 is above the number line beginning at 300 and ending at 926. !
